short_description: the jewellers association is an association based in jaipur municipal corporation, india.
long_description: established during the pre-independence era in 1927 and headquartered in jaipur's johri bazaar, the jewellers association is one of jaipur's oldest organizations, that positions jewellers as global leaders and continues to be the most influential and proactive organizations in the jewellery industry. the association was conceived and formed by the renowned jeweller late banji lal tholia, with the fundamental purpose of fostering the growth of the gems & jewellery trade in jaipur, uniting traders, artisans, and jewellers under one umbrella. making a beginning with just 37 jewellers as members, this esteemed apex body for jaipur has since flourished into a formidable force, boasting an impressive membership of 6750 members. the association has witnessed active participation from its members for generations, contributing significantly to the association's impact on the industry and the community it serves. from organizing exhibitions to fostering collaborations and creating networking opportunities, our committee members are dedicated to the growth and success of the gems & jewellery industry.
business_tags: gems & jewellery | jewellery manufacturer | creative gifts | local traders | gemstone mining | wedding season | events & attractions | health camp | psychiatric patients
generated_description: ja jaipur, established in 1927 and headquartered in jaipur's johri bazaar, is one of india's oldest trade associations. it is a leading hub for gemstone cutting, carving, trading, and jewelry manufacturing. the association, founded by renowned jeweler late banji lal tholia, aims to foster the growth of the gems and jewelry trade in jaipur. initially comprising 37 members, it has grown to a membership of 6750. ja jaipur organizes the annual jewellers association show (jas), a significant platform for the industry, and runs the janupyogi bhawan, a dharamshala that provides support to psychiatric patients and their caregivers. the association also publishes "gem world," a bi-monthly magazine exploring market trends and industry insights. ja jaipur is committed to corporate social responsibility and has been instrumental in driving advancements and positive impact within the jewelry industry.
